description: Try our easy to follow Mini Lamb Roast With Crushed Potatoes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mini Lamb Roast With Crushed Potatoes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1kg garlic & rosemary lamb leg mini roast

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Cook lamb as per packet instructions. Prepare potatoes in microwave as per packet instructions. Cool.
Using the palm of your hand, crush the potatoes and place on a baking tray. Drizzle with 1 tbs oil. Season with sea salt flakes. Roast for 10 minutes.
Add carrots to tray and drizzle with remaining oil. Cook both vegetables for a further 25 minutes until golden and crisp. Remove potatoes and transfer to a warm plate.
Drizzle honey and sprinkle almonds over carrots and cook for 4 minutes. Slice lamb and serve with potatoes, carrots and mint sauce.
